titleStmt.title: The life and death of Thomas Wolsey Cardinall Diuided into three parts: his aspiring, triumph, and death. By Thomas Storer student of Christ-church in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Storer, Thomas, 1571-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [Valentine Simmes for] Thomas Dawson,

notesStmt.note: The words "aspiring .. death." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
